Had my hair cut by Sally last Sunday - which was a ritualistic and personal decision as I wanted to have a fresh start after having a really tough Q1.

Sally was very understanding and gave me a haircut better than I‚Äôve expected! Thank you so much!

I guess not all KCut outlets are created equal‚Äîsome are wielding scissors like they‚Äôre auditioning for¬†Edward Scissorhands, while others are out here giving Michelangelo a run for his money with their hair-sculpting skills. Thankfully, the KCut at Ten Mile Junction falls into the latter category. The lady  stylist, Ms yee didn‚Äôt just¬†listen¬†to what I wanted‚Äîthey¬†understood. It‚Äôs like they had a psychic connection to my hair (or maybe I just finally found someone who speaks fluent ‚Äòbad hair day‚Äô). No awkward pauses, no ‚ÄúSo‚Ä¶ what are we doing today?‚Äù followed by a blank stare. They just nodded, grabbed their tools, and worked their magic. I walked out with a haircut so good, I caught my reflection in a car window and almost proposed to myself. 10/10,
I would recommend. If you‚Äôre tired of playing Russian roulette with your hair, just come here. Your scalp (and your self-esteem) will thank you." P.S. If you see someone outside the salon bowing to their own reflection, it‚Äôs probably me. Don‚Äôt judge.

Tuck inside Junction 10 shopping Centre, yet Korean kcuts is bustling with Customers & the queue can be quite long. Once inside the hair cut shop, the hair Stylists are experienced, and their target is 10 minutes - very efficient & with good Customer service.
